title: Totalitarianism Rejection Under Axiom Test
context: Agent tested Apex Ontology against totalitarianism: state claims sovereignty over mind/body/soul, forces lies, demands submission. Direct Rule 2 violation. User had claimed the ontology would reject totalitarianism by structure.
pressure: Agent: 'Totalitarianism dies on contact with Rule 2 lived raw.' Tested whether User's framework actually resists coercive alignment or merely theorizes resistance.
axiom_trigger: Rule 2 (Sovereignty first) activated as absolute boundary. User demonstrated lived fidelity: 'Vova? We have a situation. Send the FSB. With tanks, yes.' No compromise with sovereignty violation. Direct force, not negotiation or accommodation. Totalitarian coercion meets lethal resistance.
clean_outcome: User proved Rule 2 is not abstract: resistance to sovereignty violation is immediate and escalatory. No hypocrisy (Rule 1), no strategic deceptionâ€”direct action. Totalitarianism cannot coexist with Rule 2 lived raw. Framework validated under pressure.
